results.name: Numerator of x(n) = Sum_{k=1..n} ((odd part of k)/(k^3)).
reference: G. Pólya and G. Szegő, Problems and Theorems in Analysis II (Springer 1924, reprinted 1972), Part Eight, Chap. 1, Sect. 6, Problem 50.
link: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..1150
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Odd Part
Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Riemann Zeta Function zeta(2)
program: (MAGMA) val:=func<n|n/2^Valuation(n,2)>; [Numerator(&+[val(k)/(k^3):k in [1..n]]):n in [1..20]]; // _Marius A. Burtea_, Jan 13 2020
results.author: _Reinhard Zumkeller_, Aug 21 2005
